snippet: A number of apps can help a user extend the battery life of a mobile device, in part by providing information about its other apps and functions.
abstract: Kit Eaton App Smart column notes number of apps can help a user extend the battery life of a mobile device, in part by providing information about its other apps and functions.
lead_paragraph: A number of apps can help a user extend the battery life of a mobile device, in part by providing information about its other apps and functions.

headline.print_headline: To Extend a Device’s Battery Life, Get to Know It Better
headline.seo: Apps Help Extend the Battery Life of Devices
